name: Jargon
description:
A story based platformer with many diverse branches and routes to take, leading to the fate of everyone being upon you. 

STORY

With you having lived your whole life within a small village built upon a large tree, the fierce rivalry of the factions Biua and Piatoni can lead you down all sorts of paths...

Within the future, there is planned to be many many endings possible.

GAMEPLAY

Use A and D to move, Space to jump.

You have a grappling hook which can swing you around, allowing you to make all sorts of maneuvers while playing a level.
